title: Bird banding in Australia
creator_credit: CSIRO, Division of Wildlife Research and S.T. Evans
brief_description: Shows how the handling of birds helps biologists to collect information essential for the study and conservation of rare species and the control of pests. Some of the diverse methods banders use for trapping wild birds are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: CSIRO, Division of Wildlife Research and S.T. Evans
